name: Super Consumerism Sim 2k17 GOTY Edition
description:
Welcome to Super Consumerism Sim 2k17 GOTY Edition!

You have money. You want to spend your money. The store wants your money. See what I'm getting at?

You can buy many great products at the store, ranging from burgers, to smartphones, to bitcoin.

Now go out there and spend your money!
